name: uglify-css
description: A tool to uglify CSS files by renaming variables and classes
author: Steven Gunneweg

scripts.test:angular: cd tests/angular && npm run build && npm run uglify -- -d -a=length && npm run uglify -- -d -a=count && npm run uglify -- -d -a=countXlength && npm run uglify
scripts.test:html: cd tests/html && npm run build && npm run uglify -- -d -a=length && npm run uglify -- -d -a=count && npm run uglify -- -d -a=countXlength && npm run uglify
scripts.test:vue: cd tests/vue && npm run build && npm run uglify -- -d -a=length && npm run uglify -- -d -a=count && npm run uglify -- -d -a=countXlength && npm run uglify
